abstract.title: Introduction
abstract.para: This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with the Delegation Service. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.

important.simpara: The Delegation Service is built, installed and deployed in a default GT installation. Read for more details.

chapter.title: Building and Installing
chapter.para: The delegation service is built, installed and deployed as part of GT installation. Refer to for installation instructions.

section.title: Building and Installing Delegation Service only
section.para: This section describes installing the Delegation Service from source. The Delegation Service is a Java-only component and does not require the whole GT installation. The only depenency is on Java WS Core. The following steps describe building the Delegation Service from source and assumes Java WS Core has been installed in GLOBUS_LOCATION.

important.simpara: Credentials and a gridmap file must be configured for the Delegation Service to work. Refer to security configuration to set up credentials and gridmap files for authorization [fixme - link].

listitem.para: Delegation Service source code can be downloaded from remote CVS and access details are provided here. The module name is ws-delegation: cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.globus.org:/home/globdev/CVS/globus-packages login cvs co -r globus_4_2_branch ws-delegation
Set GLOBUS_LOCATION to point to your Java WS Core installation: export GLOBUS_LOCATION=/path/to/core/install
Run the following commands: cd ws-delegation ant deploy

listitem.simpara: Install the Delegation Service test package using GPT build.

listitem.para: To run the tests, use the following commands: $ cd $GLOBUS_LOCATION $ ant -f share/globus_wsrf_test/runtests.xml runServer \ -Dtests.jar=$GLOBUS_LOCATION/lib/globus_delegation_test.jar \ -Djunit.jvmarg="-Dorg.globus.wsrf.container.server.id=delegationTest"

listitem.simpara: The test report can be found in $GLOBUS_LOCATION/share/globus_wsrf_test/tests/test-reports/TEST-org.globus.delegation.service.PackageTests.xml.
